name: Juliet
description: Juliet is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between Cinderella 99 and NYC Diesel that uplifts both mind and body with a sweet berry aroma. A subtle buzz of cerebral energy promotes focus and sharpens the senses in a comfortable psychoactive experience conducive to social activities. Julietâ€™s happy calm may be useful for patients treating mood and stress disorders like anxiety and depression.
